title: E-Commerce Platform Redesign
summary: A complete redesign and rebuild of an e-commerce platform resulting in 45% increase in conversion rate and 30% faster load times.
description: StyleShop needed to modernize their aging e-commerce platform to improve user experience, increase mobile conversions, and streamline the checkout process. We rebuilt their entire platform using modern technologies while implementing best practices for e-commerce UX.
challenge: StyleShop's existing platform was struggling with slow performance, poor mobile experience, and a complicated checkout process leading to high cart abandonment rates. Their product catalog had grown to over 5,000 items, making search and filtering capabilities critical. Additionally, they needed better integration with their inventory management system.
solution: We developed a custom headless e-commerce solution using Next.js for the frontend and Sanity CMS for content management. The new platform features a responsive design optimized for mobile shopping, an intuitive product filtering system, and a streamlined one-page checkout process integrated with Stripe for secure payments. We implemented server-side rendering and image optimization to dramatically improve load times.

process.title: Discovery & Research
process.description: We began with extensive user research, analyzing customer journeys, pain points, and competitors. We conducted interviews with key stakeholders and analyzed analytics data to identify critical improvement areas.
process.imageAlt: Team whiteboarding session during discovery phase

process.title: UX Design & Prototyping
process.description: Based on our research findings, we created wireframes and interactive prototypes focusing on simplifying the shopping experience. We conducted usability testing with actual customers to refine the designs before implementation.
process.imageAlt: Wireframes and prototypes for the e-commerce redesign

process.title: Development & Integration
process.description: Our development team built the platform with a component-based architecture for flexibility and maintainability. We integrated with StyleShop's inventory system and implemented a robust search functionality with filters for product attributes.
process.imageAlt: Development team working on code implementation

process.title: Testing & Launch
process.description: We conducted thorough testing across devices and browsers, as well as load testing to ensure the platform could handle peak traffic. After a successful beta with select customers, we launched with a phased approach to minimize disruption.
process.imageAlt: Launch day monitoring of the new platform

testimonial.quote: The team delivered beyond our expectations. The new platform not only looks beautiful but has dramatically improved our conversion rates and customer satisfaction. The attention to detail in both design and functionality has been impressive.
testimonial.author: Sarah Johnson

results.description: Overall conversion rate improvement after 3 months
Average page load time, down from 4.5s
